title: Saut√©ed Zucchini
introduction: This is a simple and quick way to prepare a delicious side dish featuring fresh zucchini, finely chopped onions, and fragrant parsley. Its light and refreshing flavor profile makes it the perfect accompaniment to any main course.
ingredients: Salt and freshly ground black pepper

instructions.description: Scrub the zucchini with a brush under cold running water. Trim off the ends. Cut into 1/8-inch slices.
In a medium skillet over medium-low heat, melt the butter. Add the onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add the zucchini and toss to coat with the butter. Cover and cook 5 minutes, or until the zucchini is just tender when pierced with a fork.
Add salt and pepper to taste and parsley and toss well. Serve immediately.
